dmca.title: DMCA notice to Google, Inc.
dmca.body:
Hello,
 
I've written you several times regarding my poem, The Dash and its copyright being infringed upon by your bloggers.
 
Everything you require is included in this message in accordance with the DMCA. 
 
 
 
 
Below is my good faith statement and copyright information.  The web sites below, hosted by blogspot.com have my copyrighted work, "The Dash" posted unauthorized and mostly unaccredited.
 
Please have your users remove this material immediately.  I thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.
 
Linda Ellis
www.lindaellis.net
 
 
 
INFORMATION AS REQUESTED CONCERNING A COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT OF MY WORK BY
MANY OF YOUR MEMBERS:
 
 
1. A description of the copyrighted work or other intellectual property that you claim has been infringed;
 
Poem titled The Dash, a registered copyrighted work whose copyright number is Txu 858-108 as filed with the Library of Congress.
 
2. A description of the location where the material that you claim is infringing is located;

 
Infringing web sites posted below.
 
3. A statement by you that you have a good faith belief that the reported use is not authorized by the copyright or intellectual property owner, its agent, or the law;
 
I hereby state that permission was never granted for use of this copyrighted work on the web sites listed below by myself, the author and copyright owner, or any agents or representatives of my company, Linda's Lyrics.
 
4. Your address, telephone number, and, if available, e-mail address;
 
Linda Ellis
Linda's Lyrics
1050 E. Piedmont Road
Suite E-135
Marietta, GA  30062
lellis@bellsouth.net
404-966-3349
 
5. A statement by you, made under penalty of perjury, that the above information is accurate and that you are the copyright or intellectual
property owner or authorized to act on the copyright or intellectual property owner's behalf; and
 
Under penalty of perjury, I hereby state that the above information is accurate and that I am the copyright owner of the material posted
unaccredited and unauthorized on the web sites contained in this email.
 
6. An electronic or physical signature by the person making the submission (i.e., you or such other person authorized to act on behalf of the complaining party).  If the submission is made electronically, the authorized person making the submission should designate his or her
electronic signature by typing a forward slash ("/") before and after his or her typed name and follow this electronic signature by again typing his or her name.
 
 
//
 
 
 
Linda Ellis
Linda's Lyrics
1050 E. Piedmont Road
Suite E-135
Marietta, GA  30062www.lindaellis.net
www.lindaslyrics.com
www.thedash.net
